name: Platforms Don't Float
description:
Platforms Don't Float is a short "platformer" game made in Twine. How does that work? I'm still not entirely sure, or even if it does. But I had fun making it, and hope you have fun playing it, too!

I originally started making this for NaNoTwiMo, but didn't really get any time that month to work on it. But hey, it is here now!

Feedback is appreciated - this was a small experiment for fun, but I wouldn't mind making something a bit more fleshed out here, with more developed mechanics and visuals.

Note: When playing the game with the "Tab-and-Enter" controls, you may end up navigating to the Itch.Io homepage. If this happens, just press back on your browser to jump back into the game. If you are unable to "move", try clicking in the game space somewhere.

The game runs best in Chrome, with some minor clipping in Firefox. The clipping in Edge may effect how playable some levels are.
